cab.content: 4b *c-19197P GAB(This Document is the PropertyAps i.SECRET,BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 19th APRIL, 1918,Beyond patrol encounters and increased artillery activity due to improved visibility there have been no operations of importance on any part of the front to-day.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1. 19th April, 1918. Issued at 6.35 pam,
